title: Näytönohjan lakkasi vastaamasta; firefox.exe?
content:
Hei! Osaisiko joku selittään mistä johtuu, kun -firefox käynnistyy normaalisti, mutta -aina kun otan jonkun kohteen kirjanmerkeistä niin pian tulee ruutuun virheilmoitus > "Näytönohjan lakkasi vastaamasta ja palautui Intel Graphics Acceleration Drivers for Windows 8(R)" ilmoitus toistuu useita kertoja ja viimein tulee ilmoitus >"Näyttölaitteen käyttö estetty sovellutukselta Firefox.exe"

Kone on jumissa virheilmoitusten ajan ja jatkaa sitten toimintaa. Virheitä ilmeneelisäski kun esim. lukee HS.fi hesarin digilehteä, niin sivut nykivät ja välillä sivun päälle ilmestyy kummallinen moninkertainen neliöviivasto, joka osin peittää tekstin. Jos välillä sammutan FF:n ja otan samantien Chromen, niin ko. ilmoitusta ei tule ja Hesarikin toimii normaalisti. Chromen sammutuksen jälkeen paluu FF:ään tuottaa jälleen samat ongelmat????
creator: sixcats

title: Unable to log in on some sites. Rectangular boes over writing the news on one site.
content: I have been unable to log in to one site with an error saying it was offline try later. I contacted the site and was asked if I used Firefox and I replied yes. (used Firefox for quite a long time). They told me to try browser like Chrome as they were having problems with FF. I tried Chrome and had no problems. For quite a while I've had problems when I try to read the Daily Mail. As I scroll down the article, I would find that there were small rectangular boxes, similar to the one above where I am writing this, (The one that says 'which topic best etc.) only smaller. It may have something inside like 0% as an eg. This means that I can't read that part or have to guess the content. I remembered that Chrome fixed the problem on the other site so I used Chrome and no longer have an issue if I use Chrome. I am also having issues with Thunderbird. Quite some time ago, Thunderbird went haywire and started deleting emails, even though I had do not delete emails in settings. Prior to this I had never made any changes to my settings. Something else has happened. Looks to me like something has gone seriously wrong at Firefox. Is this fixable or should change over to Chrome and look for a different email service?. Cheers Vic.
creator: vic.sue

title: Video download helper with Firefox add-on stopped working – driving me bonkers
content:
System Linux mint 18.2 Sonya

Video DownloadHelper Version 7.4.0 Browser locale: en-US Production build Built on Tue Dec 15 2020 17:14:16 GMT+0100 (Central European Standard Time) Build options: browser=firefox

I used to be able to record mainly music from YouTube and some other sources using video download helper with the Firefox add-on.

It used to direct me sometimes to using the companion app, then at other times not.

The thing is now that it starts to record with a blue numbered disc showing. It gets almost to the end of the download, then the circle turns red and I get the following type of error messages – see below.

I also do not have the same layout on the 3 colour disc download helper button.

Updated the add-on but cannot find any specific help.

Would be very grateful for a simple fix, or complicated, that – OR, is there a better product??

Seasons greetings


Failed converting "youtube.com/watch?v=Tff9mJN-ZZU"

/opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libavfilter.so.7) /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libavformat.so.58) /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libavcodec.so.58) /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libvpx.so.6) /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/ffmpeg: /lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libm.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.27' not found (required by /opt/net.downloadhelper.coapp/converter/build/linux/64/libaom.so.0)
